thread.title: Easy Rider

title: Easy Rider
text:
Only registered TrekEarth members may write critiques. Photographer's Note 
Este é um pequeno centro de artesanato durante o dia e Pub à noite na pequena Vila de Ibitipoca. A Vila fica distante 4 km da entrada do Parque Estadual de Ibitipoca e onde se localizam a maioria das pousadas, bares e restaurantes . Neste mes de agosto ocorrem dois eventos importantes na vila:o Ibitipoca Off Road e o Ibitipoca Blues . This is a small craft center during the day and Night Pub in the small village of Conceição Ibitipoca. The village is 4 km away from the main entrance to the Ibitipoca State Park and in this village where are located most hotels, bars and restaurants. In August months occur two important events in the village: the Ibitipoca Off Road and Ibitipoca Blues Festival. Have a nice weekend...
